column1: wickedwix 155213078400 "2016-12-31 17:16:49 GMT" https://wickedwix.tumblr.com/post/155213078400 "emmersdrawberry:  bemusedlybespectacled:  zohbugg:   Anish Kapoor has long been known for his large-scale
column3: but his penchant for being proprietary has long irked others in the art world. But then came Vantablack. Earlier this year
column4: Kapoor sparked outrage from artists all over the world with the announcement that he had made a deal to become the only person in the world allowed to use the blackest pigment of black paint ever developed. Known as Vantablack
column5: the unique carbon nanotube-based pigment is produced solely by a British company called NanoSystem
column6: and was originally developed for military technologies. However
column7: Kapoor made an agreement with the company that he is the only person allowed to use it for artistic purposes. Needless to say
column8: that made plenty of other artists furious. â€œWhen I first heard that Anish had the exclusive rights to the blackest black I was really disappointed
